high_descs: turn to the left and go forward to the desk and turn to the right and take a step and turn to the left and take a step and go forward to the bat
pick up the bat next to the desk
turn to the opposite direction and take a step and turn to the right and go forward to the bed and turn to the right and take a step forward
turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: turn on the lamp to examine the bat

high_descs: Turn left and head towards the baseball bat on the floor.
Pick up the bat from the floor.
Turn left and walk towards the lamp on the desk.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a baseball bat next to the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Move across the room to the right corner of the wooden desk
Pick up the baseball bat that is to the right of the desk on the floor
Carry the baseball bat to the left side of the same desk where the desk lamp is on top of the desk
Turn on the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Carry a baseball bat while turning on a desk lamp

high_descs: Turn to the left, go to the corner
Pick up the baseball bat from the corner
Turn to the left, take a few steps
Facing the desk, turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Pick up the baseball bat from the corner, turn on the desk lamp

high_descs: turn left, walk across the room to the desk, stand facing the desk
pick up the bat that is in the corner
turn left, walk towards the bed, turn right to face desk and table
turn the lamp on
anns.task_desc: take the bat over to the lamp to turn it on

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the baseball bat on the floor by the desk.
Pick up the baseball bat from the floor.
Walk to the lamp on the left side of the desk.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a baseball bat by the light of a desk lamp.
